main.name: Mustafa Sencer Özcan
main.description: Huge believer of institutional governance and its relevant benefits. Aside from that I write code.
main.bio: I believe in every sense of democracy. Huge fan of parliamentary system. Mainly web developer with a diverse interest in Python, JS/TS and Go. Mainly focusing on VRP problems right now.
main.contactmessage: Hey you can contact me via any active phone which possess my number in it.
